txt.en: The bees are ready to continue pollinating flowers!
<rgb=#FF0000>A bee has given up!</rgb>
The bees are ready to return to Grimbeorn!
<rgb=#FF0000>A Lossarnach great-lily has been eaten!</rgb>
See if the bees are ready to return to Grimbeorn
Is that rock looking at you?
I guess it was just a regular rock after all
See if the bees are ready to continue.
Escort the bees back to Grimbeorn
Pollinate the second field of flowers.

'What took you so long? Did you stop and smell each and every flower? Ha, just some Beorning humour my friend! I am glad you have returned my bees to me!'

Grimbeorn turns to his bees.

'Bees! Did you have a grand meal?! I am sure you did!'
DNT
The bees are ready to continue!
Talk to Grimbeorn
See if the bees are ready to continue.
<rgb=#FF0000>A bee has given up!</rgb>
Bleat!
Escort the bees back to Grimbeorn.
The bees seem eager to pollinate!
It is time to pollinate the meadows!
<rgb=#FF0000>A bee has given up!</rgb>
Talk to Grimbeorn.

'Well here we are. Why did I agree to lend my bees and aid Gondor with pollinating the fields of Lossarnach? Well my trusted [placeholder], Gondor has conquered many foes that might one day threaten the safety of my Vale! It is the least I could do!\n\n'Yes, I have called upon you to accompany me because I know not the lands of Lossarnach. How do I guide my bees upon lands that I do not know? You however know these lands. That is why you shall guide my bees for me. Do not worry! All you have do to is make sure that my bees do no stray far afield and that no harm comes to them. That should be quite easy! This is just a woods filled with flowers after all!'
See if the bees are ready to continue
Pollinate the second field of flowers
<rgb=#FF0000>Grimbeorn's bees must finish their task!</rgb>

It would seem the bees' work here is done!
Pollinate the Lossarnach great-lilies

Grimbeorn and his dogs will stay here while you help the bees navigate the woods
The bees have pollinated the first glade!
<rgb=#FF0000>At least one Lossarnach great-lily must survive!</rgb>
The bees have pollinated the second glade!
The bees have pollinated the Lossarnach lilies!

<rgb=#FF0000>Grimbeorn's bees must finish their task!</rgb>
A group of goats has eaten all the flowers here!
Pollinate the first field of flowers
More goats?! They are trying to eat all of the flowers!
These goats will eat all the flowers in Lossarnach if left unchecked!
These goats certainly are hungry and plentiful today!
These goats must have descended in hordes down from the mountains!
'Buzz!'
Two rare Lossarnach lilies! These flowers must be protected at all costs!
Goats are heading this way to eat the rare Lossarnach Lilies!
More goats are coming!
Maa!
Even more goats!
'Buzz!'

<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter: Something dangerous lingers nearby!</rgb>
Pollinate the Lossarnach great-lilies.
'Buzz buzz!'
So many goats!

What is this?! The Great Goat, the king of all goats approaches, and he looks very hungry!
'Buzz buzz!'
My goodness, the Great Goat has been thwarted!
